articles.author: MARK SCOLFORO
articles.title: Beneath the surface, Groundhog Day’s deep roots predate Punxsutawney Phil - The Associated Press
articles.description: Groundhog Day predictions about the coming of spring put the spotlight on Punxsutawney Phil every Feb. 2. But celebrating the midpoint between the shortest and darkest day of the year and the spring equinox has ancient roots in European agricultural life. Pun…
articles.content: Groundhog Day predictions about the coming of spring put the spotlight on Punxsutawney Phil every Feb. 2, but celebrating the midpoint between the shortest and darkest day of the year and the spring … [+6045 chars]
